subject: Boxing
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Fifty years ago at Madison Square Garden, Emile Griffith delivered a pummeling to Benny Paret, who died after 10 days in a coma. Griffith was able to walk out, but not unscathed.
snippet: Fifty years ago at Madison Square Garden, Emile Griffith delivered a pummeling to Benny Paret, who died after 10 days in a coma. Griffith was able to walk out, but not unscathed.
